about.name: Roopesh S
about.objective: Smart requirement-driven professional with 6+ years of experience in Test & Development with additional expertise in Data Engineering & Full Stack Development. Specialized in Project Management, Client Coordination, and Integrated Planning.

experience.one_liner: Built and scheduled test automations for ETL, APIs, and UI, achieving 70% performance growth.
responsibilities: Built and scheduled multiple test automations using Databricks PySpark and Azure Data Factory for ETL processes, ensuring 100% test coverage.
Developed performance and load testing suites for APIs using JMeter and Postman with end-to-end integrations.
Achieved 70% performance improvement in ETL and test architecture redesign using OOP and optimisations.
Monitored regular test reports using ELK, Jenkins, Pytest, and Azure DevOps across 4 sprints.
Migrated Java Selenium UI automation to Playwright, improving test speed and reliability.
Automated API tests with Serenity BDD, Java, and Rest Assured to validate vehicle cloud data services.
Contributed to QA design documents, creating test strategies for LLM testing, RAG evaluations, prompt accuracy validation, and retrieval relevance.

experience.one_liner: Led QA & automation for Power BI dashboards and cloud pipelines, improving ETL efficiency.
responsibilities: Ensured 100% regression coverage for Power BI dashboard validation with UI and ETL automation.
Organised test strategy and implemented automatic daily report generation using Airflow and Jenkins.
Managed Scrum, test documentation, QAOps, and requirement analysis for successful project delivery.
Optimised ETL and cloud testing performance on SSMS, Denodo, Snowflake, Teradata, PowerBI, and Azure Functions, reducing data processing errors.
Automated end-to-end system integration testing using Cypress, Chai, and Robot Framework.

experience.one_liner: Handled test strategies, DevOps integration, and performance optimisation for client projects.
responsibilities: Led INDIGO Books and Music project test strategies, business analytics, sprint management, and production support.
Performed DevOps integration testing on TeamCity and Octopus, building CI/CD pipelines for console and ETL applications on Azure.
Optimised test scripts to reduce blindspots and data latency using Databricks, Azure Functions, ADF pipelines, SSMS, Data Warehouse, and Data Lake.
Enhanced system design and test architecture for UI automation using Playwright over Selenium.
Planned, executed, and managed API, mobile apps, cloud, and security testing.

experience.one_liner: Performed automation and performance testing for APIs and web apps using Python, Java, and Selenium frameworks.
responsibilities: Built browser and REST API automation using Selenium, Rest Assured, Serenity BDD, and Pytest for rapid regression reporting.
Organised load and performance testing on APIs and web apps using JMeter, BlazeMeter, and Postman.
Managed SDLC and test strategies with Jira, Zephyr Scale, Agile, GitHub, Xray, and SonarQube.
Conducted compliance validation for Android and iOS applications, ensuring ETL data integrity and end-to-end QA standards.

projects.title: Automated ETL Framework
projects.description: A high-performance data validation engine built with PySpark and Azure Databricks.
